column1: Tim was in the kitchen, ready to make lunch. Tim wanted to make a big bowl of pasta. The pasta box was full. A bird flies into the kitchen through the open window. Tim does not see the bird.
Fiona was at the park with her friends. They wanted to play a game of soccer. The ball they had was clean and shiny. A squirrel runs across the field. Fiona does not see the squirrel.

Olivia was at the park, sitting on a bench. Olivia wanted to feed the ducks with her bag of bread. The bread was fresh and smelled good. A colorful butterfly lands on the bench next to Olivia. Olivia does not see the colorful butterfly.
Ina was at the park, sitting on a bench. Ina wanted to watch the birds play. A small, pink bird was awake on a tree branch. A dog runs past Ina, chasing a ball. Ina does not see the dog.
John was at the park, sitting on a bench. John wanted to propose to his girlfriend and marry her. His ring box was in his cap. A butterfly lands on John's shoulder. John does not see the butterfly.

Jill was at the park, watching the kids play. She wanted to take a video of her son's first time on the swing. The camera was off. A butterfly lands on the swing next to Jill's son. Jill does not see the butterfly.
Ben was at the ranch, looking after the animals. Ben wanted to ride his favorite horse. The saddle was not heavy. An unusual bird lands on the ranch fence. Ben does not see the unusual bird.
Vinny was in the gloomy hall of his school. He wanted to zoom around on his new roller skates. The hall was empty. The school bell rings loudly. Vinny does not hear the school bell ring.
Fred was at a fun fair, excited to play games. Fred wanted to win a big teddy bear as a prize. The game machine was on. A clown starts performing nearby. Fred does not see the clown.
Sam was at the beach, having a picnic. Sam wanted to visit his friend after eating his sandwich. The sandwich was tasty. A dog runs across the beach, chasing a ball. Sam does not see the dog.
Quin was at the park with his friends. Quin wanted to show his friends he was brave. The park's gate was locked. A squirrel runs across the park. Quin does not see the squirrel.
Sam was in the park, near the big inflatable castle. Sam wanted to jump and play in the castle. The castle was big and inflated. A squirrel runs past Sam. Sam does not see the squirrel.

Queenie was in the park, looking at the beautiful flowers. Queenie wanted to pick a green leaf to make a print for her art project. The leaf she saw was fresh and green. A squirrel runs up a nearby tree. Queenie does not see the squirrel.

Xander was in the park, playing with his friends. He wanted to build a big sand structure. The sand was wet and good for building. A butterfly lands on a nearby flower. Xander does not see the butterfly.

Bella was in the library, looking for a good book to read. Bella wanted to find an attractive book to read before her nap. The book shelf was full of books. A child drops a toy car near Bella. Bella does not see the toy car.
Zara was at a birthday party. Zara wanted to give her friend a gift. The gift was securely wrapped. A clown arrives at the party. Zara does not see the clown.

Dave was in a lively party at his friend's house. Dave wanted to go upstairs to get his coat. The door upstairs was unlocked. A dog starts barking loudly at the party. Dave does not hear the dog barking.
Mabel was near a swamp, looking for frogs. Mabel wanted to catch a frog to show her friends. The swamp was still and quiet. A bird flies over the swamp. Mabel does not see the bird.

Xander was at the doctor's office for a check-up. Xander wanted to be a good patient and stay calm. The doctor's light switch was off. A cat walks into the doctor's office. Xander does not see the cat.
Ed was at a birthday party. Ed wanted to tell a funny joke to his friends. The juice jug was full. A piece of cake falls from the table. Ed does not see the piece of cake fall.
Zara was in her garden, ready to plant some flowers. Zara wanted to dig holes with her spade. The spade was strong. A butterfly lands on a flower in Zara's garden. Zara does not see the butterfly.
Xena was at a party, dancing with her friends. Xena wanted to drink her yellow lemonade. The lemonade cup was full. A purple balloon pops at the party. Xena does not hear the balloon pop.

Kira was in the park, playing with her friendly dog, Max. Kira wanted to throw a bright, plastic ball for Max to fetch. The ball was very bright. A squirrel runs across the park. Kira does not see the squirrel.
Luke was in the forest, looking for wood to build a treehouse. Luke wanted to find a big, strong tree to cut. The saw was sharp. A squirrel runs past Luke. Luke does not see the squirrel.
Amy was at the park, sitting on the bench. Amy wanted to play with her red balloon. The balloon was big and full of air. A dog starts barking loudly near Amy. Amy does not hear the dog barking.

Jack was at the park, having fun on his own. Jack wanted to hop on the big man statue in the park. The man statue smelled neutral. A dog runs across the park barking loudly. Jack does not see the dog.

Jill was at a party with her friends. Jill wanted to tell a funny joke to make everyone laugh. Her friend, Tom, was awake and listening. A balloon pops loudly in the party. Jill does not hear the balloon pop.

Bob was in a busy city, looking for a place to eat. Bob wanted to try a new food place. The food place was open. A street performer starts playing music nearby. Bob does not hear the street performer.
Wendy was in the living room, doing her morning yoga. Wendy wanted to check her yoga poses in the mirror. The mirror was standing upright. The doorbell rings. Wendy does not hear the doorbell ring.
Carl was in a park, playing soccer with his friends. Carl wanted to shoot the ball into the goal. The ball was on the ground. A squirrel runs up a tree nearby. Carl does not see the squirrel.

Kira was in the forest, looking for wood to build a fire. Kira wanted to find a tree to cut down with her axe. The axe was sharp. A bird starts singing loudly in a tree nearby. Kira does not hear the bird singing.

Rita was in the library, looking for a good book to read. Rita wanted to find a book on the top shelf of the bookcase. The bookcase was organized and neat. A cat walks into the library. Rita does not see the cat.

Zara was in her room, cleaning up her toys. Zara wanted to put her teddy in its tidy toy trap. The toy trap was empty. A butterfly flies into the room through the open window. Zara does not see the butterfly.
Ben was in the garden, sitting on a rock. Ben wanted to build a birdhouse. The bag of nails smelled like fresh metal. A butterfly lands on Ben's drawing. Ben does not see the butterfly.

Ed was at the park, ready to ride his scooter. Ed wanted to ride his scooter all around the park. The scooter was upright, ready to be ridden. A child starts flying a kite in the park. Ed does not see the child with the kite.

Max was at an ice cream shop on a hot day. Max wanted to buy an expensive, sweet ice cream cone. The ice cream cone was cold. A mist starts to fall outside the ice cream shop. Max does not see the mist.

Xander was in the garden, admiring the flowers. Xander wanted to make a bouquet of smooth poppies for his mom. The poppies were sweet smelling. A butterfly lands on a nearby rose. Xander does not see the butterfly.
Pia was at the park, ready to have a picnic. Pia wanted to eat her sandwich with cheese. The cheese was solid and cold. A butterfly lands on a flower near Pia. Pia does not see the butterfly.

Quinn was at the park, standing on a high bridge. Quinn wanted to drop a small toy figure into the river below. The figure was in his hand. A butterfly lands on the bridge railing. Quinn does not see the butterfly.

Gabe was in the park, ready to fly his kite. Gabe wanted to let his kite fly high in the sky. The kite's string was tightly wound on the reel. A butterfly lands on a nearby flower. Gabe does not see the butterfly.

Tanya was at the beach, sitting in her small hut. Tanya wanted to draw a picture of her hut on a big piece of paper. The paper was straight and smooth. A crab scuttles into the hut. Tanya does not see the crab.
Zara was at the zoo, close to the monkey cage. Zara wanted to feed the monkeys. The bag of peanuts was full. A parrot squawks loudly from a nearby tree. Zara does not hear the parrot squawk.
Yara was at her house, getting ready for a party. Yara wanted to invite all her friends to the party. The veil on Yara's head was still. A cat walks into the room. Yara does not see the cat.

Greta was at the park, taking pictures with her camera. Greta wanted to print a unique picture of a butterfly. The camera had a sweet smell from the perfume Greta used. A squirrel scurries past Greta, chattering loudly. Greta does not hear the squirrel.

Lisa was at a big party, feeling shy. Lisa wanted to join the fun and clap along with the music. The cap on her water bottle was twisted tight. The music at the party changes to a slow song. Lisa does not hear the slow song.
Ina was at a lively party with her friends. Ina wanted to light a fire in the fireplace. The match box was full. The doorbell rings. Ina does not hear the doorbell ring.
Daisy was at the park with her friendly dog, Max. Daisy wanted to play fetch with Max. The dog's toy was on the ground. A little girl comes over to pet Max. Daisy does not see the little girl.
Ben was at the park, playing with his friends. Ben wanted to share his new toy belt with his friends. The belt was in his bag. A butterfly lands on a nearby flower. Ben does not see the butterfly.

Dora was in the park, ready to go for a run. Dora wanted to use the path that goes around the lake. The path was clear and free of ice. A delicious smell of freshly baked cookies wafts from a nearby bakery. Dora does not smell the cookies.

Zara was in the park, looking at a four-leaf clover she had found on the ground. Zara wanted to keep the lucky clover safe in her locket. The locket was empty. A butterfly lands on Zara's shoulder. Zara does not see the butterfly.

Gina was in her room, playing with her toys. Gina wanted to fit all her toys into her toy box. The toy box was very organized. A cat enters the room and starts playing with a toy mouse. Gina does not see the cat.
Mabel was in the city park, happily flying her kite. Mabel wanted to let her kite fly high in the sky. The sky was clear and blue. A dog runs through the park. Mabel does not see the dog running.

Nia was at the park, ready to play with her friends. Nia wanted to celebrate her birthday by playing hoop games. The hoop was in its place, ready to be used. A butterfly lands on a nearby flower. Nia does not see the butterfly.
Xander was at the park, playing in the sandbox. Xander wanted to build a big sand castle. The sand was smooth and easy to shape. A dog runs past the sandbox. Xander does not see the dog running.

Finn was at a big restaurant, ready to order food. Finn wanted to order a big pizza from the menu. The menu was long and full of food items. A balloon from a nearby birthday party pops loudly. Finn does not hear the balloon pop.
Lily was in her room, doing her homework. Lily wanted to finish her homework using her new pen. The pen was full of ink. A cat jumps onto Lily's desk. Lily does not see the cat.
Fred was in the bathroom, ready to take a shower. Fred wanted to enjoy a hot shower. The shower head was clean. A spider crawls up the bathroom wall. Fred does not see the spider.

Chloe was at the park, playing on her favorite slide. Chloe wanted to slide down the huge slide many times. The slide was very slippery. A squirrel runs across the park. Chloe does not see the squirrel.
Luke was at the park, watching his team play soccer. Luke wanted his team to win the match. The soccer ball was new and clean. A butterfly lands on Luke's shoulder. Luke does not see the butterfly.
Wendy was in the park, waiting for her friends. She wanted to play with her new clean ball. The ball was clean. A butterfly lands on Wendy's shoulder. Wendy does not see the butterfly.
Jack was at the bus stop, waiting to go to school. Jack wanted to ride the big yellow bus. The bus was bright yellow in the sun. A dog runs by the bus stop. Jack does not see the dog.

Ollie was at the beach, having fun with his friends. Ollie wanted to bury a long cable in the sand to make a popular game called "Find the Treasure". The cable was smooth and easy to handle. A seagull lands near Ollie's group. Ollie does not see the seagull.

Una was at the zoo, watching the hippos. Una wanted to take a picture of the biggest hippo. The hippo was near the water's edge. A monkey escapes from its cage and runs past Una. Una does not see the monkey running past.

Sally was in her room, working on her art project. Sally wanted to design a sculpture out of gum. The gum was very strong. A cat jumps onto Sally's desk and knocks over a cup of water. Sally does not see the cat knock over the water.

Usha was in her classroom, ready to teach a lesson. Usha wanted to use a flexible ruler to draw straight lines on the board. The ruler was straight. A cat enters the classroom through the open door. Usha does not see the cat.
Abby was in the park, ready to play. Abby wanted to skip with her favorite jumping rope. The rope was bright red. A lonely bird lands on a nearby stick. Abby does not see the bird.

Tina was at the fair, having a fun time. Tina wanted to win a big teddy bear at the ring toss game. The ashtray at the game booth was intact. A clown starts making balloon animals nearby. Tina does not see the clown.
Quin was at the park, playing with his dog. Quin wanted to give his dog a treat. The dog treat was very tasty. A curious squirrel comes over to Quin and his dog. Quin does not see the squirrel.

Ollie was at the park, looking up at the sky. Ollie wanted to see a cloud that looked like a bunny. The sky was clear and blue. A butterfly lands on Ollie's sandcastle. Ollie does not see the butterfly.
Ella was at home, ready to start her day. Ella wanted to eat a piece of pie for breakfast. The pie was fresh. A distant sound of a car horn is heard. Ella does not hear the car horn.

Wendy was in her room, playing with her toys. Wendy wanted to clean her favorite toy, a soft bear. The bear smelled nice. A butterfly flies into the room through the open window. Wendy does not see the butterfly.

Nia was in her room, doing her math homework. Nia wanted to finish her homework fast so she could play. The math book was on her desk. A squirrel runs across the yard, visible from Nia's window. Nia does not see the squirrel.
Molly was at a peaceful park, sitting under a tree. Molly wanted to read her new book. The book was okay strong. A dog runs through the park chasing a frisbee. Molly does not see the dog.

Molly was in the swamp, looking for frogs. Molly wanted to catch a charming green frog for her school project. The lid of her frog jar was tightly twisted. A loud thunder sound is heard in the distance. Molly does not hear the thunder sound.

Pete was at the park, watching his furry kite fly. Pete wanted to fly his kite higher than the trees. The string on Pete's kite was untied. A dog chases a ball across the park. Pete does not see the dog.

Fiona was at the park with her family, getting ready for a picnic. Fiona wanted to have a successful dinner at the park. The picnic basket was full. A butterfly lands on Fiona's shoulder. Fiona does not see the butterfly.
Nia was in the park, drawing pictures. Nia wanted to make a creative picture of a leaf. The leaf was green and big. A dog runs through the park, chasing a ball. Nia does not see the dog.

Tina was in her room, getting ready for a party. Tina wanted to wear her new dress. The dress was hanging on the stair railing. A cat jumps onto the bed and starts playing with a ball of yarn. Tina does not see the cat playing.

Kira was at the park, playing with her toy car on a rough path. Kira wanted to race her toy car down the hill. The toy car was still. A butterfly lands on a flower nearby. Kira does not see the butterfly.
Nora was standing on the side of a busy street. Nora wanted to catch a taxi to go home. The taxi light was off. A thick cloud covers the sun. Nora does not see the cloud.

Harry was at the race track, ready to drive his big racing car. Harry wanted to speed around the track as fast as he could. The car's motor was working well. A bird lands on the race track. Harry does not see the bird.
Sam was in his bed, ready for sleep. Sam wanted his mom to read him a story. The story book was new. A cat jumps onto the bed. Sam does not wake up and does not see the cat.
Sally was in her room, sitting at her desk. Sally wanted to finish her homework. The desk was clean. A cat jumps onto the window sill and meows loudly. Sally does not hear the cat meowing.
Ruth was in her bedroom, playing with her toys. Ruth wanted to clean up her messy table. The table was full of toys. A cat jumps onto the window sill. Ruth does not see the cat.

Wanda was in the quiet park, sitting on a bench. Wanda wanted to enjoy her lunch. The fork she brought was shiny and clean. A dog starts barking loudly at the other end of the park. Wanda does not hear the dog barking.

Iris was in her room, playing with her toys. Iris wanted to dress her doll in new clothes. The clothes box was full of many pretty dresses. A cat jumps onto the window sill. Iris does not see the cat.

Tara was in the park, sitting under a big tree. Tara wanted to read her new book in the peaceful open air. The tree was standing tall and firm. A squirrel runs across the park. Tara does not see the squirrel.
Sam was at the park on a hot day. Sam wanted to cool down with a cold drink. His water bottle was full. A dog runs past Sam and his friends. Sam does not see the dog running past.

Ike was at school, sitting in a boring lecture. Ike wanted to doodle on his notebook to pass the time. The ink pen was full of ink. A weird sound comes from the back of the lecture hall. Ike does not hear the weird sound.
Ella was in her room, ready to paint a picture. Ella wanted to paint a gem she found in the garden. The gem was on the table. The lights in the room flicker. Ella does not see the lights flicker.

Kate was in the garden, looking at her flowers. Kate wanted to admire the big red rose she had been taking care of. The rose was in full bloom. A butterfly lands on a nearby flower. Kate does not see the butterfly.
Ben was at the beach, playing in a sandcastle contest. Ben wanted to win the contest with his impressive sandcastle. The tide was far away. A seagull lands nearby. Ben does not see the seagull.
Zoe was in the park, ready to do her daily exercise. Zoe wanted to do a set number of sit-ups. The grass was dry and good to sit on. A dog runs past Zoe, chasing a ball. Zoe does not see the dog.
Lucy was at the park, ready to race. Lucy wanted to win the big race. Her running shoes were new and fast. A butterfly lands on Lucy's shoulder. Lucy does not see the butterfly.
Rob was at a fun fair with his wife. Rob wanted to win a big teddy bear for his wife. The teddy bear game was loud. A clown starts making balloon animals nearby. Rob does not see the clown.
In a big zoo, Ivy was a zookeeper. Ivy wanted to feed the big lion. The lion's food was fresh. A wealthy man comes to the zoo for a visit. Ivy does not see the wealthy man.
Fred was in his old house, cleaning up. Fred wanted to open the attic to see what was inside. The attic door was stuck. A cat runs across the yard. Fred does not see the cat.

Carla was in her art studio, working on a new project. Carla wanted to design a purple postcard to send to her friend. The stack of mail was white. A cat jumps onto Carla's table. Carla does not see the cat.

Wilma was at the train station, waiting for her train to come. Wilma wanted to use the train to go to her friend's house. The train was on the rail. A dog runs through the train station. Wilma does not see the dog.
Bob was at the park, sitting by the deep pond. Bob wanted to catch a big fish for dinner. The bait on his hook was fresh. A dog runs by and jumps into the pond. Bob does not see the dog.

Wendy was at the park with her young dog. Wendy planned to play fetch with her dog using a new toy. The toy was in an untwisted state. A group of kids start a game of soccer nearby. Wendy does not see the kids playing soccer.
Quinn was in the music room, holding his guitar. Quinn wanted to record a new song. The tape recorder was on. A cat wanders into the music room. Quinn does not see the cat.
Pat was at the park, sitting on a bench. Pat wanted to have a cup of hot cocoa. The cocoa cup was big. A squirrel comes and sits next to Pat on the bench. Pat does not see the squirrel.

Yara was in the park, looking at a green brick wall. Yara wanted to draw the green brick wall for her art project. The green brick wall had a fresh, pleasant smell. A squirrel runs across the park. Yara does not see the squirrel.
Ina was in the park, looking at the sky. Ina wanted to see a shooting star. The sky was clear. A wise owl hoots in a nearby tree. Ina does not hear the owl.
Mary was in the park, sitting on a bench. Mary wanted to eat her blueberry muffin. The muffin was in her lunch box. A butterfly lands on the bench next to Mary. Mary does not see the butterfly.
Ella was in the park, sitting under a shelter. Ella wanted to repair her broken toy car. The toy car was in many pieces. A butterfly lands on Ella's shoulder. Ella does not see the butterfly.
Zara was in the garage, ready to build a birdhouse. Zara wanted to cut the wood with her saw. The saw was sharp. A cat jumps onto the garage roof. Zara does not see the cat.

Rita was in her garden, planting new flowers. Rita wanted to fix a new home for her roses in the regular, firm soil. The soil was hard. A butterfly lands on one of the flowers in Rita's garden. Rita does not see the butterfly.

Hannah was in the library, studying for her big test. Hannah wanted to remember all the things written on the page of her book. The page was flat and easy to read. A librarian walks by and drops a pencil. Hannah does not see the pencil drop.

Nia was in the park, playing with her kite. Nia wanted to fly her kite high in the sky. The kite string was untwisted. A thunderstorm starts to form in the distance. Nia does not see the thunderstorm.

Fred was at the gym, ready to start his workout. Fred wanted to use the cable machine for his exercise. The cable machine was free. The gym's sound system starts playing a loud song. Fred does not hear the loud song.
Quincy was at the park, playing with his toy truck. Quincy wanted to drive his toy truck on the normal path. The toy truck's battery was full. A dog runs across the park. Quincy does not see the dog.

Polly was at the airport, waiting for her flight. Polly wanted to check in her luggage and get on the plane. The luggage was big and round. A successful businessman walks past Polly. Polly does not see the successful businessman.

Yara was at the park, watching a mole dig a hole. Yara wished to take a picture of the mole. The mole was on the surface of the grass. A child's balloon pops nearby. Yara does not hear the balloon pop.

Val was in the park with her cute yellow kite. Val wanted to fly her kite high in the sky. The kite's string was securely fastened to the handle. A dog starts barking loudly near Val. Val does not hear the dog barking.

Ed was in the park, ready to play with his new laser toy. Ed wanted to show his friends how the laser toy could light up at night. The laser toy was working well. A squirrel runs up a nearby tree. Ed does not see the squirrel.
Carl was at the edge of the forest, ready for a day of fun. Carl wanted to go on a long walk through the forest. His water bottle was full. A bird flies overhead. Carl does not see the bird.
Cora was in her room, playing a game. Cora wanted to guess the answer to the last riddle. The riddle book was open. A light beam enters the room through the window. Cora does not see the light beam.

Quinn was in the park, sitting on a bench. Quinn wanted to feed the ants with a piece of bread. The piece of bread was heavy. A butterfly lands on the bench next to Quinn. Quinn does not see the butterfly.

Lila was at a big show, ready to perform her dance. Lila wanted to do a great dance and make everyone applaud. Her dance shoes were in the cabinet. A clown comes on stage to entertain the audience. Lila does not see the clown.
Xena was in a park, sitting on a bench. Xena wanted to read her new book in peace. The book was closed. A squirrel runs across the park. Xena does not see the squirrel.

Cara was on a hike in the dark forest. Cara wanted to reach the top of the cliff to see the sunrise. The path up the cliff was smooth. A bird starts singing in a tree nearby. Cara does not hear the bird singing.

Alice was at the park, getting ready to play hide and seek. Alice decided to hide behind the big door of the park's tool shed. The door was closed. A squirrel runs across the park. Alice does not see the squirrel.
column2: Door of the park's tool shed.

column1: Liam was at the beach, looking at his new boat. Liam wanted to sail his boat in the sea. The boat was tied to a pole. A big wave comes and washes a bucket onto the beach. Liam does not see the big wave and the bucket.

Jill was in the park, ready to play a game of dare. Jill wanted to dare her friend to hit a target with an arrow. The arrow was sharp. A fake snake falls from a tree. Jill does not see the fake snake.
Patty was in her room, playing with her toy fairy. Patty wanted her toy fairy to fly. The toy fairy was stable on the table. A cat jumps onto the window sill. Patty does not see the cat.

Ollie was in the park, ready to play a game of football. Ollie wanted to unite his friends for a fun game. The football was smooth. A wise old man with a cross around his neck walks by. Ollie does not see the wise old man.

Greta was in the park, sitting on a bench. Greta wanted to provide food to the animals. The bag of food she had was full. A group of children start playing football near Greta. Greta does not see the children playing football.

Wendy was at her friend's house for a sleepover. Wendy wanted to wear her friend's smooth bracelet to the party. The bracelet was on the table. The sun begins to rise outside. Wendy does not see the sun rising.
Vicky was in a farm, near the goat pen. Vicky wanted to feed the goats. The bucket was round and full of goat food. A flock of birds flies over the farm. Vicky does not see the flock of birds.

Pete was at the post office, ready to mail a letter. Pete wanted to send a letter to his friend. The letter was bright, with colorful stamps on it. A dog enters the post office. Pete does not see the dog.

Amy was in her room, playing with her toy drum. Amy wanted to make a loud sound with her drum. The drum skin was tightly attached. A bird flies into the room through the open window. Amy does not see the bird.

Ugo was at the park, playing with his new red balloon. Ugo wanted to show his friends how high his balloon could fly. The balloon was big and fully inflated. A dog runs by, chasing its tail. Ugo does not see the dog.
Winnie was at her desk in the office. She wanted to order new office supplies. The paper tray was full. The office lights flicker momentarily. Winnie does not notice the lights flicker.

Ollie was in the park, sitting on his popular red seat. Ollie wanted to read a book on his seat. The seat was clean and smelled pleasant. A squirrel drops a nut from a tree. Ollie does not see the nut falling.
Pete was at the barber shop, waiting for his turn. Pete wanted to get a clean haircut. The barber shop was organized. A cat walks into the barber shop. Pete does not see the cat.
Tanya was at the park, near a tall building. Tanya wanted to draw a picture of the building. The building was rare and old. A dog runs through the park, chasing a ball. Tanya does not see the dog.

Lucy was in the garden, planting some flowers. Lucy wanted to keep her dress clean, so she wore a nice apron. The apron was dry. A butterfly lands on one of the flowers. Lucy does not see the butterfly.
Toby was in his room, ready for a nap. Toby wanted to sleep on his pretty, soft bed. The bed was made and neat. A toy car rolls into the room. Toby does not see the toy car.

Jenny was at the park, by the pond with her toy boat. Jenny wanted to sail her toy boat across the pond. The pond was calm. A squirrel runs by with a nut in its mouth. Jenny does not see the squirrel.

Quinn was in the yard, ready to start his lemonade stand. Quinn wanted to add sugar to his lemonade to make it sweet. The sugar jar was big. A butterfly lands on Quinn's lemonade stand. Quinn does not see the butterfly.

Harry was in the woods, ready to go camping. Harry wanted to set up his tent before it got dark. The tent was in its bag. A squirrel jumps from a tree and lands near Harry. Harry does not see the squirrel.
Amy was at the park, playing with her red ball. Amy wanted to bounce the ball and catch it. The ball was very dry. A cherry falls from a tree nearby. Amy does not see the cherry fall.
Lila was in the small town park, ready to fly her new kite. Lila wanted to fly the kite high in the sky. The kite string was tight. It starts to rain lightly. Lila does not feel the rain.

Vicky was in her room, trying to fix her toy car. Vicky wanted to make the toy car run again. The toy car's wheel was loose. A butterfly flies into the room through the open window. Vicky does not see the butterfly.

Harry was in his room, trying to finish his homework. Harry wanted to use a poem for his English assignment. The book of poems was very heavy. A squirrel jumps onto the window sill and starts chattering loudly. Harry continues sleeping and does not see the squirrel.
Ollie was at the park with his pet dog, True. Ollie wanted to play fetch with True. True was awake and ready to play. A squirrel runs across the park. Ollie does not see the squirrel.

Ula was at the park, ready to play. Ula wanted to record a video of her adventurous dog doing tricks. The dog was awake and ready to play. A butterfly lands on a flower near Ula. Ula does not see the butterfly.
Ellie was at the park, sitting by the lake. Ellie wanted to catch a big fish with her rod. The rod was shiny and new. A butterfly lands on Ellie's shoulder. Ellie does not see the butterfly.

Xander was at the park, playing with his new kite. Xander wanted to win the kite flying contest. The kite string was neatly wrapped around the handle. A clown starts performing tricks near the contest area. Xander does not see the clown.
Henry was in his room, getting ready for school. Henry wanted to organize his school bag. His pencil box was full. A bird lands on the window sill. Henry does not see the bird.
Tina was at the beach, sitting on a towel. Tina wanted to swim in the sea. The towel was dry. A seagull lands near Tina. Tina does not see the seagull.

Jane was in her room, getting ready for a party. Jane wanted to find a lipstick that would match her dress. The lipstick box was easy to open. A cat jumps onto the window sill, meowing loudly. Jane does not hear the cat meowing.

Vicky was in the park, ready to have a picnic. Vicky wanted to sit on a nice spot and eat her lunch from her basket. The basket was organized with all her favorite foods. A kite flies overhead. Vicky does not see the kite.

Wendy was in her art class, ready to start a new project. Wendy wanted to make a weird pattern on her canvas. The paint pot was full. A butterfly flies into the class through the open window. Wendy does not see the butterfly.
Elsie was in the park with her young dog, Spot. Elsie wanted to teach Spot to catch a ball. The ball was round. A scary looking cat enters the park. Elsie does not see the scary looking cat.
Nora was in her room, getting ready for a party. Nora wanted to polish her shoes so they would look shiny. The shoe polish can was full. Nora's phone rings. Nora does not hear her phone ring.

Qiana was in her room, playing with her toy house. Qiana wanted her toy house to stay up so she could play with her dolls in it. The toy house was strong. A butterfly flies into the room through the open window. Qiana does not see the butterfly.
Cindy was at the park, ready to play a game of hide and seek. Cindy wanted to hide in a big tree. The old boot was under the tree. A squirrel runs up the big tree. Cindy does not see the squirrel.
Sally was at a birthday party, dressed as a pirate. Sally wanted to win the best costume prize. The cake on the table looked yummy. A balloon pops loudly. Sally does not hear the balloon pop.

Toby was in the park, playing with his toy lion. Toby wanted to make the toy lion roar for his friends. The toy lion's battery was securely fastened. A squirrel runs up a nearby tree. Toby does not see the squirrel.

Lily was in her room, getting ready for school. Lily wanted to pack her white school bag. The bag was well organized. The school bus driver honks the horn outside. Lily does not hear the bus driver honk the horn.

Hilda was at the park, ready to play catch. Hilda wanted to catch the ball with her clean glove. The glove was on the bench, clean and ready. A squirrel runs up a tree nearby. Hilda does not see the squirrel.
Jack was in the lab, working on his science project. Jack wanted to make his laser light up. The laser was off. A classmate drops a beaker in the lab. Jack does not hear the beaker break.

Hana was at the park, ready to play. Hana wanted to dare her friend to climb the big yellow slide. The slide was very hot from the sun. A squirrel runs across the park. Hana does not see the squirrel.
Quinn was at the park, sitting on a bench. Quinn wanted to drink water from the tap. The tap was smooth. A butterfly lands on the bench next to Quinn. Quinn does not see the butterfly.
Sam was in a distant field, picking fruit. Sam wanted to fill his basket with pears. The pear tree was full of ripe pears. A distant cow moos loudly. Sam does not hear the cow.
Tina was in the park, ready to play. Tina wanted to play on the blue swing. The swing was free. A butterfly lands on a nearby flower. Tina does not see the butterfly.

Quincy was at a fun party with lots of kids. Quincy wanted to win the cake in the cake walk game. The cake was big and yummy. A clown starts making balloon animals. Quincy does not see the clown making balloon animals.

Max was in the garden, looking at a big maze. Max wanted to go through the maze without getting lost. The maze was full of blooming flowers. A squirrel runs across the garden. Max does not see the squirrel.

Dan was at the zoo, looking at the animals. Dan wanted to take a picture of the gray leopard. The leopard was sleeping on a tree. A group of school children enter the zoo. Dan does not see the group of school children.
Vera was at the playground with her friends. Vera wanted to go on the slide, but it was too hot from the sun. The slide was very smooth. A dog runs through the playground. Vera does not see the dog.
Lucy was at the beach, looking at the sea. Lucy wanted to see a big whale. The sea was calm. A seagull lands on Lucy's beach towel. Lucy does not see the seagull.
Wally was at the park, ready to play. Wally wanted to climb the big tree. The tree was tall and strong. A car honks loudly in the distance. Wally does not hear the car honk.

Ira was at a fun fair with his aunt. He wanted to win a big teddy bear at a game. The game was loud with many kids playing. A clown starts making balloon animals near the game. Ira does not see the clown.

Ron was at the fair, in front of a doughnut machine. Ron wanted to eat a hot, fresh doughnut. The doughnut machine was making round doughnuts. A clown starts performing tricks nearby. Ron does not see the clown.

Hank was at a busy fair, near the balloon stand. Hank wanted to win a big, brown balloon for his friend. The balloon was big and inflated. A clown starts performing tricks nearby. Hank does not see the clown.
Nia was in the park, looking at the trees. Nia wanted to find a fairy hiding in the trees. The trees were full of green leaves. A cold wind blows through the park. Nia does not feel the cold wind.
Bob was in the park, sitting under a banana tree. Bob wanted to eat a ripe banana. The banana was hanging delicately on the tree. A dog runs by, chasing a frisbee. Bob does not see the dog.

Xander was at the circus, ready to perform his juggling act. Xander wanted to juggle three bright handles. The handles were very bright. A clown starts making balloon animals. Xander does not see the clown making balloon animals.

Xena was at the zoo, looking at the crocodiles. Xena wanted to take a picture of a big, fast crocodile. The crocodile was in the water. A loud noise comes from the monkey cage. Xena does not hear the loud noise.
Zara was at the park, sitting on a bench. She wanted to see the sunset. The sun was high in the sky. A dog appears in the park and starts running around. Zara does not see the dog.

Jill was in the park, playing with her new kite. Jill wanted to fly her kite high in the sky. The string of the kite was long and stretched. A dog starts barking loudly near Jill. Jill does not hear the dog barking.

Remy was at the fun fair, standing before the scary roller coaster. Remy wanted to race through the sky on the roller coaster. The exit gate of the roller coaster was closed. A clown starts juggling nearby. Remy does not see the clown juggling.
column2: Exit gate of the roller coaster

column1: Yara was at her desk, ready to write a unique letter. Yara wanted to put the letter in a big envelope. The envelope was empty. Yara's phone rings. Yara does not hear her phone ring.
Lily was at the park, ready to play with her friends. Lily wanted to win the marble game. The marble bag was tied up tight. A butterfly lands on a nearby flower. Lily does not see the butterfly.
Polly was at the shop, looking for a new dress. Polly wanted to buy a different dress for her friend's party. The dress she liked was clean. A dog runs into the shop. Polly does not see the dog.

Lucy was at home, planning a big party. Lucy wanted to invite all her friends from the west. The big ice sculpture in the living room was solid. A cat jumps onto the table and knocks over a vase. Lucy does not see the cat knocking over the vase.

Jill was at the zoo, standing near the elephant pen. Jill wanted to take a picture of the big, fat elephant. The elephant was in the open, easy to see. A group of children start to kick a soccer ball near the elephant pen. Jill does not see the children playing soccer.

Polly was at the park, sitting on a swing. Polly wanted to swing high up in the sky. The swing's chain was securely fastened. An intelligent parrot lands on the swing next to Polly. Polly does not see the parrot.
Sam was in the garden, planting beans. Sam wanted to grow a big bean plant. The bean bag was full. A butterfly lands on a nearby flower. Sam does not see the butterfly.
Ella was in her room, sitting at her desk. Ella wanted to write a letter to her best friend. The envelope was empty. A cat jumps onto the desk. Ella does not see the cat.

Mary was in the farm, feeding the animals. Mary wanted to tie the cow to the fence using a rope. The rope was stretched tight. A lovely butterfly lands on the cow's nose. Mary does not see the butterfly.
Wendy was at home, cleaning her room. Wendy wanted to drink a cold juice from the fridge. The fridge was filled with many bottles of juice. A cat walks into the room. Wendy does not see the cat.
Quin was at the park, on a sunny day. Quin wanted to fly his beautiful triangle kite. The kite was new and in perfect shape. A group of ducks waddles by. Quin does not see the ducks.
Amy was at the park, playing with her friends. Amy wanted to blow big soap bubbles. The soap bottle was full. A squirrel runs past Amy and her friends. Amy does not see the squirrel.
Daisy was at the park, ready to play. Daisy wanted to fly her kite high in the sky. The kite was light. A butterfly lands on Daisy's sunglasses. Daisy does not see the butterfly on her sunglasses.

Carl was at a fun fair, standing in front of a game booth. Carl wanted to win a big fat teddy bear. The teddy bear was hanging on a very stable hook. A clown starts making balloon animals nearby. Carl does not see the clown.

Ben was in the library, looking for a book about the world. Ben wanted to find a big map of the world to display in his room. The world map in the library was complete. A cat walks into the library. Ben does not see the cat.

Will was in the zoo, looking at the leopards. Will wanted to see the big leopard lay down to sleep. The leopard's bed was empty. A group of school children start running and shouting next to the leopard's cage. Will does not see the children.
Ingrid was in her garage, ready to fix her unique bike. Ingrid wanted to oil the bike's pedal. The pedal was rusty. A cat walks into the garage. Ingrid does not see the cat.

Ben was at the park, flying his new kite. Ben wanted to show his kite to his friend, who was a pilot. The kite was strong and firm. A cheap ice cream truck comes to the park. Ben does not see the ice cream truck.
Ula was in the park, ready to play with her friends. Ula wanted to win the game of tag. The juice box she brought was full. A butterfly lands on a nearby flower. Ula does not see the butterfly.
Sam was in the park, sitting on a bench. Sam wanted to fly his new kite. The kite string was untied. A squirrel scurries across the grass nearby. Sam does not see the squirrel.
Dora was at school, in her messy art class. Dora wanted to teach her friends how to make a big clay pot. The lump of clay was big. The school bell rings for lunch. Dora does not hear the school bell.
Vera was in the forest, looking for a special tree. Vera wanted to find the tree with the brightest leaves. The forest was very bright. A clever fox crosses Vera's path. Vera does not see the fox.
Finn was at the park, playing with his kite. Finn wanted to fly his kite high in the sky. The kite's string was tangled. An ice cream truck arrives at the park. Finn does not see the ice cream truck.
Xander was in the art room, ready to draw a picture. Xander wanted to draw a bald eagle. His pen was clean. A cat enters the art room. Xander does not see the cat.

Carl was at the park, looking at the street from a bench. Carl wanted to watch the interesting cars pass by. The street was busy with cars. A squirrel runs by Carl's bench. Carl does not see the squirrel.

Fiona was at the park, watching the pigeons. Fiona wanted to feed the pigeons with the big bag of bird food she brought. The bag of bird food was full. A dog runs past Fiona, chasing a ball. Fiona does not see the dog.
Rita was in the barn, feeding the horses. Rita wanted to give a big pile of hay to each horse. The hay pile was big. A cat jumps onto a bale of hay. Rita does not see the cat.

Lily was in the park, playing hide and seek with her friends. Lily wanted to find a good hiding spot. The big tree had lots of leaves and looked like a good hiding spot. A squirrel runs across the park. Lily does not see the squirrel.
Ina was in the park, playing on the swing. Ina wanted to swing high and touch the sky. The swing was straight and steady. A butterfly lands on Ina's leg. Ina does not see the butterfly on her leg.

Rose was at the park, looking at the brilliant hot air balloon. Rose wished to ride the hot air balloon. The hot air balloon was inflated and ready to go. A squirrel runs across the park. Rose does not see the squirrel.
Ben was at the farm, picking fresh vegetables. Ben wanted to find a rare red onion. The onion looked white. A rabbit hops across the farm. Ben does not see the rabbit.

Sally was at the zoo, looking at the rhinoceros. Sally wanted to take a picture of the rhinoceros when it was relaxing. The rhinoceros was standing up. A group of school children come running and shouting towards the rhinoceros enclosure. Sally does not see the group of school children.
